roles.name: Super User
roles.description: System Administrator. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.

roles.name: TL Counter Employee
roles.description: Counter Employee in Trade License who files TL on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: TL Approver
roles.description: Approver who verifies and approves the TL application

roles.name: Finance Adminsitrator
roles.description: All Employees who are Finance application administrator

roles.name: WS Counter Employee
roles.description: Counter Employee for  Water connection who files WC on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: WS Approver
roles.description: Approver who verifies and approves the Water Connection application

roles.name: SW Counter Employee
roles.description: SW counter employee can take action as citizen

roles.name: SW Field Inspector
roles.description: SW Inspector can take action like verify and forword, send back to do

roles.name: SW Approver
roles.description: SW Approver can approve the connection application

roles.name: SW Clerk
roles.description: SW Clerk can activate the connection application
